snippet: Topics of lectures at the New-York Historical Society include affirmative action, Woodrow Wilson and the New York Armory Show.
abstract: Topics of lectures at the New-York Historical Society include affirmative action, Woodrow Wilson and the New York Armory Show.
lead_paragraph: Affirmative action, New York’s Armory Show and the presidency of Woodrow Wilson are some of the topics at the New-York Historical Society’s coming season of the Bernard and Irene Schwartz Distinguished Speakers Series, which begins this fall.

headline.main: Wide-Ranging Talks at New-York Historical Society
